# 2024–25 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey rankings

Two human polls make up the '''2024–25 NCAA Division I men's ice hockey rankings', the USCHO.com/CBS College Sports poll and the USA Hockey/The Rink Live poll. As the 2024–25 season progresses, rankings are updated weekly.
